data.title: Cumbia Electronica
data.meta_description: Influenced by traditional Latin American music and infused with modern club compatibility, Cumbia El...
data.text:
Influenced by traditional Latin American music and infused with modern club compatibility, Cumbia Electr√≥nica has been taking over dance floors all over the world.

Slow pulsating bass drums set a foundation for lively percussion and acoustic instruments that sound powerful at home and on a big PA.

These futuristic sound FX blend naturally with the classic instruments of South and Central America giving you a perfect assortment of loops for your next Cumbia inspired tune!

Package contains 305 Loops* in 87 BPM.

98 bass loops (14 loops in 7 pitches)

4 drum kits with variations

49 FX loops (7 loops in 7 pitches)

5 FX loops (in universal pitch)

21 guitar loops (3 loops in 7 pitches)

42 keys loops (6 loops in 7 pitches)

14 mallet loops (2 loops in 7 pitches9

7 pad loops (1 loop in 7 pitches)

14 sequence loops (2 loops in 7 pitches)

28 synth loops (4 loops in 7 pitches)

Soundpools from MAGIX contain full orchestral and/or song compositions, broken down into stems or individual samples, with each instrumental stem and sample available in 7 different tonal variations (for example, one bass loop will be available in A, Bb, C, D, E, F and G).
